text: (ai rasool vah vakt yaad dilao) jab tumhaare paravaradigaar ne pukaar pukaar ke (banee eesarail se kah diya tha ki vah qayaamat tak un par aise haaqim ko musallat dekhega jo unhen buree buree takaleephen deta rahe kyonki) isamen to shaq hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar bahut jald azaab karane vaala hai aur isamen bhee shaq nahin ki vah bada bakhshane vaala (meharabaan) bhee hai
